languages.text: Потеряв старую Риззу и ее ближайших помощников, Пустотное братство вскоре погрузилось в кровавую свару за право занять ее место. Борьба был столь жестокой, что не оставалось сомнений — победитель в ней станет куда более страшным злом для Простора, чем была когда-то отчаянная пиратка.

After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.
languages.original_text: Потеряв старую Риззу и ее ближайших помощников, Пустотное братство вскоре погрузилось в кровавую свару за право занять ее место. Борьба был столь жестокой, что не оставалось сомнений — победитель в ней станет куда более страшным злом для Простора, чем была когда-то отчаянная пиратка.

traits.locale_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest assistants, the Fellowship of the Void soon devolved into a bloody mess of a succession crisis. The fight was so brutal, that it left no doubts — whoever the winner will be, they will be a much bigger threat to the Expanse than the reckless former pirate leader ever was.

After losing Ryzza and her closest assistants, the Fellowship of the Void soon devolved into a bloody mess of a succession crisis. The fight was so brutal, that it left no doubts — whoever the winner will be, they will be a much bigger threat to the Expanse than the reckless former pirate leader ever was.

After losing Ryzza and her closest assistants, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much bigger threat to the Expanse than the reckless late pirate ever was.

After losing Ryzza and her closest assistants, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much bigger threat to the Expanse than the reckless late pirate ever was.

After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

languages.text: 虚空协联失去了莱萨与她最亲密的助手，很快陷入了一场血腥而混乱的继承危机。这场争斗极其残酷，而且毫无疑问，无论最终胜出的人是谁，都会对科罗努斯扩区构成更加严重的威胁。
languages.original_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

traits.locale_text: 虚空协联失去了莱萨与她最亲密的助手，很快陷入了一场血腥而混乱的继承危机。这场争斗极其残酷，而且毫无疑问，无论最终胜出的人是谁，都会对科罗努斯扩区构成更加严重的威胁。

languages.text: Nachdem sie Ryzza und ihre engsten Partner verloren hatten, brach bei den Gefährten der Leere bald ein blutiger und chaotischer Erbfolgekrieg aus. Die Kämpfe waren derart brutal, dass ihr Sieger zu einer sehr viel größeren Gefahr für die Ausdehnung zu werden drohte, als die verwegene Piratin Ryzza es je gewesen war.
languages.original_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie Ryzza und ihre engsten Assistenten verloren hatten, brach bei den Gefährten der Leere bald ein blutiger und chaotischer Erbfolgekrieg aus. Die Kämpfe waren derart brutal, dass ihr Sieger zu einer sehr viel größeren Gefahr für die Ausdehnung zu werden drohte, als die verwegene Piratin Ryzza es je gewesen war.

languages.text: Après avoir perdu Ryzza et ses plus proches associés, la Communauté du vide sombra dans une crise de succession sanglante. Les combats étaient si violents que celui ou celle qui en sortirait vainqueur deviendrait assurément une menace bien plus terrible pour les Étendues que ne l'avait jamais été la célèbre pirate.
languages.original_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir perdu Ryzza et ses plus proches assistants, la Communauté du vide sombra dans une crise de succession sanglante. Les combats étaient si violents que celui ou celle qui en sortirait vainqueur deviendrait assurément une menace bien plus grave pour les Étendues que le plus téméraire des pirates.

languages.text: Tras perder a Ryzza y a sus socios más cercanos, la Hermandad del Vacío no tardó en caer en una crisis de sucesión sangrienta y brutal. La lucha era tan encarnizada que no quedaba duda de que quien se alzara con la victoria sería una amenaza mucho más grave para la Extensión que su osada predecesora.
languages.original_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

traits.locale_text: Tras perder a Ryzza y a sus oficiales más cercanos, la Hermandad del Vacío no tardó en caer en una crisis de sucesión sangrienta y brutal. La lucha era tan encarnizada que no quedaba duda de que quien se alzara con la victoria sería una amenaza mucho más grave para la Extensión que su osada predecesora.

languages.text: リザとその側近を失ったことで、虚空の仲間の間では、たちどころに血みどろの跡目争いが勃発した。その凄惨な抗争で誰が生き残ることになったとしても、かの無謀な先代よりも、勝者のほうがエクスパンスにとってはるかに危険な存在となることに疑いはなかった。
languages.original_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

traits.locale_text: リザとその側近を失ったことで、虚空の仲間の間では、たちどころに血みどろの跡目争いが勃発した。その凄惨な抗争で誰が生き残ることになったとしても、かの無謀な先代よりも、勝者のほうがエクスパンスにとってはるかに危険な存在となることに疑いはなかった。

languages.text: Ryzza'yı ve en yakın ortağını kaybeden Uçsuz Kardeşliği, kısa süre içinde kanlı ve karmakarışık bir veraset krizine sürüklendi. Savaşlar o kadar vahşiydi ki galibin, hayatını kaybeden pervasız korsana kıyasla Enginlik için çok daha büyük bir tehdit arz edeceği kesindi.
languages.original_text: After losing Ryzza and her closest associates, the Fellowship of the Void soon fell into a bloody and messy succession crisis. The fighting was so brutal, there could be no doubt that whoever came out of it the victor would be a much greater threat to the Expanse than the reckless deceased pirate ever was.

traits.locale_text: Ryzza'yı ve en yakın partnerini kaybeden Uçsuz Kardeşliği, kısa süre içinde kanlı ve karmakarışık bir veraset krizine sürüklendi. Savaşlar o kadar vahşiydi ki, zaferi kazanan kişinin, Enginlik için hayatını kaybeden pervasız korsandan çok daha büyük bir tehdit arz edeceği kesindi.
